oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tobacco and snack shop
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior of unidentified shop (possibly in Farragut Hotel?). Cigars and tobacco products at left, spittoon on floor. Sign for Camel. Coca-Cola signs and lunch or snack counter in mid-picture. Magazines on wall at back of store, telephone, man with broom. Clock on wall, ceiling fan. Signs for Bruch's.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tobacco shops; Snack bars; Clocks & watches; Telephones; African Americans;
